name: Poseidon's Orb
description:
Charlotte's been transformed into a merperson and threatened by a sea witch! To get their old life back, they'll have to steal a valuable artifact from an underwater kingdom. As they learn more about Poseidon's Orb and the merpeople of Aquatris, will Charlotte have a change of heart?

This game was made in two months for the SuNoFes 2021 game jam!

The soundtrack is also available here.

Story Anna 'Lavinnia' Kończak - Writer, Director Joshua S. Robinson "WordyRobin" - Writer Connor Sullivan - Editor Voice Actors Abby Espiritu - Voice of Ligaya Cat Protano - Voice of Charlotte Jett Barker - Voice of Blake Elissa Park - Voice of Isabella Bel Rusape - Voice of Benjamin Josh Portillo - Extras Hanna Hofer - Extras Artists Emily i "Yona" - Sprite artist Sara "TeddiBura" - Background Artist Rodrick "RodFireProductions" - CG Artist Audio & Music Emer O'Reilly - Mixer Simon Zaleski - Composer Heather Koenig "NovaRhetta"- Lyricist Aife94 - Singer Programming Rodrick "RodFireProductions" - Programmer Joshua S. Robinson "WordyRobin" - Programming Assistant Quick Menu Icons Freepik from flaticon.com
